attributes.action: re-imburse dental patients forced to seek private treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are being cheated on dental care - if a patient is forced to go private to get treated quickly, or at all, then the NHS should re-imburse the patient with the amound that would have been paid to an NHS dentist less the contribution that the patient would have paid under the NHS
